meanings.definition: A type of daffodil with white petals and a yellow center.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the paperwhite flowers bloomed beautifully under the sun.
meanings.sent2: I planted paperwhite bulbs in the spring for a lovely display in my yard.
meanings.sent3: The paperwhite daffodils whispered secrets to the tulips next to them.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as pure and delicate as a paperwhite petal.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the paperwhite blossoms filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A type of e-reader device developed by Amazon.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading on my paperwhite before bed to relax.
meanings.sent2: The paperwhite is lightweight and convenient for carrying around.
meanings.sent3: When I dropped my paperwhite, it landed softly on the carpet.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up with joy as he unwrapped the new paperwhite.
meanings.sent5: The paperwhite screen mimics the look of real paper for a comfortable reading experience.

meanings.definition: A type of paper used for printing books and documents.
meanings.sent1: The library ordered a fresh batch of paperwhite for the upcoming book fair.
meanings.sent2: The paperwhite is smooth and perfect for high-quality prints.
meanings.sent3: As the printer ran out of paperwhite, the office scrambled to restock.
meanings.sent4: The words seemed to dance on the paperwhite as she read the novel.
meanings.sent5: The paperwhite pages held the knowledge of centuries within their fibers.
